commit message: Clean up the way color vbo generation occurs

Associate a HalfRhombusType with a HalfRhombusButton

This allows us to calculate the aspect ratio in HalfRhombusType, and
to get rid of SkinnyHalfRhombusButton and FatHalfRhombusButton
Simplify the handling of rhombus types in the options activities
Improve the way preferences are handled
Add upgrade logic for old preferences
Add GLPixelBuffer class
Fix ok button on layout options screen
Add the scale information to PenroserPreferences
Implement context menu for half rhombus buttons in options menu

Protect the render method with a semaphore

This is to prevent graphic corruption when multiple instances
are running concurrently (i.e. if a GLPixelBuffer is used to
make a snapshot while a PenroserView is running)

Reset the last drawing time when resetting the renderer

This ensures that the renderer knows that it is running
for the first time on the first draw
Add PenroserStaticView class
Correctly handle the case when the 'theEngine' reference is null
Refactor the preference construction code
Implement gallery view for showing/selecting saved color schemes
Use a dynamic list to back the gallery
Add context menu for gallery items
Add PenroserPreferences.toJsonObject()
Update the rendered view when changing the preferences for a PenroserStaticView
Add support for editing saved color schemes
Add support for copying color schemes
Add support for deleting coloc schemes
Always use the preference stored with the PenroserView when possible
Use a normalized scaling factor in the saved preferences
Add a 'Set as Wallpaper' menu item to the activity
Force PenroserStaticView to report measurements as square dimensions when possible
Add SquareTextView, which reports measurements as square dimensions when possible
Don't try to generate a bitmap with a dimension of 0
Modify gallery view to by dynamically sized, and use for both port and landscape
Implement 'Drawer' interface in GLPixelBuffer
Optimize the rendering of the static views
Remove spurious activity from manifest
Update version to 1.1
